definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: In modern poetry, there are sound and meaning with the structure of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在现代诗词中存在着音义同构的现象。

sentences.english: Poem text need not have empty lines inserted between their lines.
sentences.chinese: 诗词类的文字在行与行之间不需填加空白行。

sentences.english: This situation has exposed the ancient poetry, teaching high school language problems.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况暴露了高中语文古代诗词教学中存在的问题。

sentences.english: Ancient poetry word middle have the verse "translating" the sum "day lily"?
sentences.chinese: 古诗词中有“译”和“萱”的诗句么？

sentences.english: I picked it up and found it was a collection of Pound's translations of Chinese classical poetry.
sentences.chinese: 我拿起来发现这是庞德翻译的中国古典诗词集。

sentences.english: In the Qing dynasty, creation of women's poetry in Huizhou flourished.
sentences.chinese: 在清代，徽州女性诗词创作出现了较为繁荣的局面。

sentences.english: Labor poetry, the words express the country seen their homes destroyed more than the miserable death.
sentences.chinese: 工诗词，其词多表达国破家亡之凄苦。

sentences.english: Poetry, each literary style, have their own unique style.
sentences.chinese: 诗词歌赋，每一种文学样式，都有各自的独特体式。

sentences.english: Without the hoof shaped rhyme, Chinese antithetical couplets may not be differentiated from poetry, Ci and Qu.
sentences.chinese: 马蹄韵使对联与诗词曲特别是诗的界限变得清晰。

sentences.english: Although has studied the poems and songs, actually cannotapprove to teacher the love.
sentences.chinese: 虽学过了诗词歌赋，却赞不完对老师的爱。

sentences.english: When we say the authentic literature, one is poetry; do you know what the other one is?
sentences.chinese: 所谓的文学正宗，一个是诗词，另一个是什么？

sentences.english: Zhu Sbu- zhen was a woman poet in Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 朱淑贞是与李清照同时的女诗词家。

sentences.english: I stood in the songs of childhood Yin, the backdrop of the poetry.
sentences.chinese: 我的童年矗立在歌吟里，掩映在诗词中。

sentences.english: What peom would you teach if you work in an international school?
sentences.chinese: 如果在国际学校教汉语，会选择什么诗词来教？

sentences.english: Compared with the poetry writing, I prefer the four- Chinese-character idioms.
sentences.chinese: 相比较诗词曲啊，我倒是最喜欢我们的四字成语。

sentences.english: "North Tour set, " that is the way this line from the poetry collection.
sentences.chinese: 《北游集》即为此行往返途中所作诗词集。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
a pre-Tang Dynasty genre of poetry, relatively free in form, usually having four, five, six or seven characters per line
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
verse or song form from Yuan, Ming and Qing
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
to read aloud with expression/to recite/to declaim
